406:11: tasmin sūryaprabhe romavivare dvādaśaśatasahasrāṇi kanakamayānāṃ parvatānāṃ prativasanti|
406:13: teṣāṃ parvatānāṃ pārśvāni padmarāgopacitāni pārśve divyamaṇiratnakhacitāni|
406:24: janayitvā ca te bodhisattvāstebhyaḥ kūṭāgārebhyo niṣkrāmanti|
406:29: gatvā ca paryaṅkamābhujya ṛjukāyaṃ praṇidhāya abhimukhāṃ smṛtimupasthāpya|
406:31: tataḥ kulaputra romavivarādavatīrya indrarājo nāma romavivaraḥ|
406:34: tatteṣāṃ parvatānāṃ madhye padmāvabhāso nāma cintāmaṇiratnam|
406:38: na ca teṣāṃ sāṃsārikaṃ duḥkhaṃ vidyate|
406:41: na ca teṣāmanyā cintā śarīre saṃvidyate |
406:54: ekaikasmin parvate'śītiśṛṅgasahasrāṇi vividharatnakhacitāni paramaśobhanīyāni vividhacitrāṇi ramaṇīyāni|
406:57: ye te prathamacittotpādikā bodhisattvaste śūnyatānimittaṃ cintayanti|
406:64: idaṃ kāye saṃvegamanuvicintya tadā te paryaṅkamābhujya ṛjukāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhāṃ smṛtimupasthāpya teṣuparvatarājeṣu viharanti|
406:65: tataḥ kulaputra romavivarādavatīrya cittarājo nama romavivaraḥ|
406:70: teṣu parvatarājeṣu vividhāni kalpavṛkṣāṇi sauvarṇadaṇḍāni rūpyapatrāṇyanekaratnakhacitāni vividhālaṃkārapralambitāni maulīkuṇḍalasragdāmapralambitāni keyūrahārārdhahārapralambitāni kāśikavastrapralambitāni sauvarṇarūpyaghaṇṭāruṇarūṇāyamānāni|
406:73: tadā sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī tato romavivarādavatīrya sarvapaścimo'yaṃ romavivaraḥ dhvajāgro nāma romavivaraḥ|
406:81: tasmin romavivare navanavatikūṭāgāraśatasahasrāṇi divyasauvarṇamayāni muktāhārapaṭadāmakalāpapralambitāni ghaṇṭāmālāpralambitāni candrakāntiratnāvabhāsitāni |
406:83: te jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ ca dharmaṃ deśayanti|
406:91: evaṃ vividhāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtvā jāmbudvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ kālena kālaṃ dharma deśayanti|
406:92: evaṃ te kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya romavivarāṇi yāvatpaśyanti|
406:98: bhagavānāha–tataḥ kulaputra romavivarādatikramya avalokiteśvarasya dakṣiṇaṃ pādāṅguṣṭhaṃ yatra te catvāro mahāsamudrāḥ paribhramanti,
406:104: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat–tadapi bhagavan romavivaraṃ saṃvidyate?
406:108: asminneva jetavanamahāvihāre mama darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya,
406:109: maheśvarasya devaputrasya sahāyā lokadhātau vyākaraṇamuddeśāya ca||
406:112: āgatya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punareva jetavanādvihārānniṣkramya avīciṃ mahānarakaṃ gacchanti|
406:114: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat–kuto bhagavan raśmaya āgacchanti kutra gacchanti?
406:115: bhagavānāha–evaṃ kulaputra avalokiteśvareṇa nānāvidhā raśmaya utsṛṣṭāḥ|
406:117: āgatya ca māṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya avīciṃ mahānarakaṃ gacchanti|
406:126: atha tasmin jetavanavihāre praviṣṭo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte sthitaḥ |
406:133: athāvalokiteśvaro bhagavantaṃ padmānyupanāmayati–imāni te bhagavannamitābhena tathāgatena prahitāni |
406:134: pṛcchatyalpābādhatāṃ ca alpātaṅkatāṃ ca laghūtthānatāṃ ca sukhasparśavihāratāṃ ca|
406:137: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantametadavocat–labheyāhaṃ bhagavan vyākaraṇanirdeśasya samuddeśam?
406:139: gaccha kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaste vyākaraṇaṃ dāsyati|
406:140: atha maheśvaro devaputro'valokiteśvarasya pādayornipatya stotraviśeṣaṃ kartumārabdhaḥ–
406:141: namostvalokiteśvarāya maheśvarāya padmadharāya padmāsanāya padmapriyāya śubhapadmahastāya padmaśriye parivṛtāya jagadāsvādanakarāya pṛthivīvaralocanakarāya prahlādanakarāya||
406:142: evaṃ maheśvaro devaputro gatvā avalokiteśvarasya stotraviśeṣaṃ kṛtvā tūṣṇīṃbhāvena vyavasthitaḥ|
406:143: atha avalokiteśvarastametadavocat–kiṃ kāraṇaṃ tvaṃ kulaputra tūṣṇīṃbhāvena vyavasthitaḥ?
406:144: atha maheśvaro devaputrastametadavocat–dadasva me vyākaraṇamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau|
406:145: avalokiteśvarastametadavocat–bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ kulaputra vivṛtāyāṃ lokadhātau bhasmeśvaro nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān|
406:146: atha sā umādevyupasaṃkramyāvalokiteśvarasya pādau śirasā vanditvā avalokiteśvarasya stotrābhidhānaṃ kartumārabdhāḥ–
406:147: namo'stvalokiteśvarāya meheśvarāya prāṇaṃdadāya pṛthivīvaralocanakarāya śubhapadmaśriye parivṛtāya nirvāṇabhūmisaṃprasthitāya sucetanakarāya dharmadharāya||
406:148: evaṃ sā umādevī stotrābhidhānaṃ kṛtvā avalokiteśvarasya pratyāhāraṃ kartumārabdhā-parimocaya me strībhāvājjugupsanīyāt |
406:150: athāvalokiteśvarastāmetadavocat–bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ bhagini umeśvaro nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān|
406:151: himavataḥ parvatarājasya dakṣiṇe pārśve tava lokadhāturbhaviṣyati|
406:154: vyākṛtā umādevī avalokiteśveraṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarve te'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau ||
406:155: ayaṃ kulaputra maheśvaranirvyūho nāma khyāta iti ||
